actions.committee: Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs (Formerly:  Post Office and Civil Service)
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs (Formerly:  Post Office and Civil Service).

official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide that Federal income tax returns may be mailed free of postage.

summary.text: Allows Federal income tax returns to be mailed free of postage.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide that Federal income tax returns may be mailed free of postage.
